text:
Hello Everyone,

I am facing some issues in app development.I have created the custom CRM but I am not able to show the info in the Card every time it is showing this error. Please check the screenshot.

This means the response you are sending is not the way HubSpot expects it. In the public app that includes this crm card you can see in the monitoring which url was called - maybe you have a look at what your server is returning for that url.
(And make sure to never send a property with a value of null -> learned that the hard way a while ago :wink: )
Anyone know how to trigger the 500-system page by the way?
Hey all, just wan to double check — this option isn't available for custom modules right? I have to add my own desktop and mobile groups?

Reminder: Don’t forget to keep your HubSpot CLI up to date to ensure you have the latest CLI features, bug/usability fixes and performance improvements. • <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#upgrade|How to upgrade your CLI to the latest version>.
